name: Nine Times the Lives
description:
You're a cyborg cat with a gun. What more is there to say? Also you have the power to reverse time to cheat death. Out of bullets? Just rewind to a time when you had some. Dead? Rewind time and get revenge on your foes! They won't know what hit them.

A fast paced game with immaculate gamefeel and easy learning curve. Great for a short dopamine rush!
